data.title: Croatia’s Largest Companies by market capitalization, 2024

data.text:
As of August 5, 2024, ZAGREBACKA BANKA is the most valuable company in Croatia, with a market cap of $6.75 billion. Following it are INA-INDUSTRIJA NAFTE ($4.91 billion) and HRVATSKI TELEKOM ($2.66 billion).

Which one is the most valuable in Croatia by market cap?

This list comprises the biggest companies currently in Croatia by market cap in 2024:

Croatia’s Largest Companies by market capitalization, 2024

RANKCOMPANYMARKET CAPTIAL (USD DOLLAR) 1ZAGREBACKA BANKA D.D.$6.75 billion 2INA-INDUSTRIJA NAFTE, D.D.$4.91 billion 3HRVATSKI TELEKOM D.D.$2.66 billion 4PODRAVKA D.D.$1.27 billion 5ADRIS GRUPA D. D.$1.24 billion 6KONCAR - ELEKTROINDUSTRIJA D.D.$1.02 billion 7JADRANSKI NAFTOVOD D.D.$0.935 billion 8KONCAR - DISTRIBUTIVNI I SPECIJALNI TRANSFORMATORI D.D.$0.920 billion 9PLAVA LAGUNA D.D.$0.844 billion 10ATLANTIC GRUPA D.D.$0.805 billion 11ÐURO ÐAKOVIC GRUPA D.D.$0.692 billion 12VALAMAR RIVIERA D.D.$0.688 billion 13CROATIA OSIGURANJE D.D.$0.639 billion 14MAISTRA D.D.$0.533 billion 15HRVATSKA POSTANSKA BANKA D.D.$0.517 billion 16CROATIA AIRLINES D.D.$0.343 billion 17ERICSSON NIKOLA TESLA D.D.$0.266 billion 18IMPERIAL RIVIERA D.D.$0.251 billion 19BOSQAR D.D.$0.240 billion 20MEDIKA D.D.$0.196 billion 21ARENA HOSPITALITY GROUP D.D.$0.186 billion 22KRAS D.D.$0.172 billion 23CIAK GRUPA D.D.$0.147 billion 24DALEKOVOD D.D.$0.135 billion 25LIBURNIA RIVIERA HOTELI D.D.$0.132 billion 26AD PLASTIK D.D.$0.056 billion 27HELIOS FAROS D.D.$0.055 billion 28VILLA DUBROVNIK D.D.$0.054 billion 29PRIMO REAL ESTATE D.D.$0.049 billion 30PODRAVSKA BANKA D.D.$0.043 billion
